body: I want to know what mods are approved and if the sprinting toggle bannable? I have it and when I turn it on my game crashes, just wondering if there is a way avicus did that? Thanks
body_tagged: I want to know what mods are approved and if the sprinting toggle bannable? I have it and when I turn it on my game crashes, just wondering if there is a way avicus did that? Thanks
title: Mod Help

replies.body:
Heey iiDarudePvP,

Please refer to §C of the rules if you want to know what mods are allowed and which aren't.
But to answer your question, toggle sprint is allowed. But toggle sneak or any other mod that makes you run faster isn't.

If you have more questions, just ask below :)

replies.body:
Toggle sneak is allowed as long it does not allow you to access a GUI while sneaking.
Toggle sprint is allowed but not allowed on OCN ayyyyy.
